mapper.select: select ras.student_id, ras.score, s.name as student_name, s.student_no, s.class_id, s.grade_id, s.major_id from t_rec_add_score ras left join t_student s on s.id = ras.student_id where year_id = #{yearId}
select s.class_id, ras.score from t_rec_add_score ras left join t_student s on s.id = ras.student_id where year_id = #{yearId}
select s.major_id, ras.score from t_rec_add_score ras left join t_student s on s.id = ras.student_id where year_id = #{yearId}
select s.class_id, ras.score from t_rec_add_score ras left join t_student s on s.id = ras.student_id where year_id = #{yearId}

select s.name as student_name, c.name as class_name, t.name as class_teacher, sum(ras.score) as score, u.avatar_id as avatar_id from t_rec_add_score ras left join t_student s on s.id = ras.student_id left join t_user u on u.login_name = s.student_no left join t_class c on c.id = s.class_id left join t_teacher t on t.id = c.teacher_id where ras.year_id = #{yearId} group by ras.student_id order by score desc limit 10

select c.name as class_name, t.name as class_teacher, sum(ras.score) as score, u.avatar_id as avatar_id from t_rec_add_score ras left join t_student s on s.id = ras.student_id left join t_class c on c.id = s.class_id left join t_teacher t on t.id = c.teacher_id left join t_user u on u.login_name = t.job_no where ras.year_id = #{yearId} group by s.class_id order by score desc limit 10
mapper.update: update t_rec_add_score set state = 1 where create_time <= date_sub(curdate(), interval #{timeout} day) and state = 2;
